attributes.action: save Nocton Hall, a grade II listed building which burnt down in 2004 and has since been left to rot.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Historic Nocton Hall was built in 1841 and was burnt down 163 years later in 2004. The hall has been used as a RAF hospital during the two world wars and was built for Frederick Robinson who was a former prime minister and chancellor of the exchequer.
For more information please visit: http://www.macla.co.uk/newsmag/2005/09/nocton-hall-a-history.html

rejection.details: You may like to contact your local authority in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
